definitions.definition: A substance that is harmful or lethal to a living organism when ingested.
examples: We used a poison to kill the weeds.

definitions.definition: Anything harmful to a person or thing.
An alcoholic drink . (Mainly in the phrases "name your poison" and "what's your poison?")
examples: — What's your poison ? — I'll have a glass of whiskey.

definitions.definition: Any substance that inhibits catalytic activity .

main_definition: A substance that is harmful or lethal to a living organism when ingested.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Anything harmful to a person or thing.
( informal , idiomatic ) An alcoholic drink . (Mainly in the phrases "name your poison" and "what's your poison?")
( chemistry ) Any substance that inhibits catalytic activity .
